Dorei didn't seem to mind a bit, they all noticed. It was clear she was used to playing a little outside the rules. Kitai on the other hand, was clearly a little on edge. "Are you sure you don't want to head home?" The arcanine asked, knowing full well what her answer would be. The whole trip, he'd tested her by purposely putting her on the spotlight and seeing how she reacted. So far, with a blush and a 'no problem', she'd happily agreed to give him her share of food, to swim across a pond for him, and now, she was saying she had no problem staying out so late when Tsuki knew that she was terrified of the night time. "Uhm, no...it's fine! Really, I was just...thinking about something, don't worry about it!" The darkness hid her blush, but he could feel the trembling in her voice. Dorei, while noticing something strange between the dog and her friends, didn't really know what to make of it. "Hey, Tsuki, why don't you go get us something to snack on? I bet the girls are hungry!" Tsuki, who was sitting between Arcanine and Dorei, got up almost instantly, and gave her friends a strange glance before running back into the delpths of the woods before Kitai could object. "It's fine," Arcanine told her as Dorei watched him get a little closer to her. "She loves helping us out. Such a good girl, always ready to show the love." He said in her ear as he started pressing his body against hers. Kitai was almost frozen. She didn't know what to do with him so close to her. His extremely warm fur made her body feel like it was on fire, made worse by the blush from having him so close. And still, he pressed closer against her. "Erm...a-arcanine...I don't really think Tsuki...I-I mean this doesn't feel-" She couldn't continue when she felt him brushing his tongue over her. 1111121111111212121111112122111111222212.content:
Tsuki's eyes widened in fear. “Oh no!” She said, causing Mesu and Riyu to look over.

“What?!” They both exclaimed.

“I think they know where we live!” Riyu and Mesu rushed to the windows. After looking at the street for a moment, they all ducked back down because walking down the street, checking house numbers was the arcanine, the houndoom, and the mighteyena.

“What do we do now?! It’s hours before our parents get home and we’re blocks away from home anyway. Not to mention that none of us are in fighting shape.” Tsuki lamented.

“How do they know where I live?” Riyu wondered out loud.

“They must have bullied the secretary somehow into giving them the information.” Mesu answered. Riyu looked down in thought, and threw her arms up in the air.

“That’s it. I’m calling my brother.”

“Your brother?” Tsuki said looking over at Riyu as she walked over to the phone. “You didn’t mention a brother before.”

“I try to leave him out of things.”

“Is he gonna be able to beat 3 evolved pokemon?” Riyu didn’t answer she just dialed and waited patiently for someone to pick up on the other end.

“Hi, bro.” She waited as her brother happily greeted her and began to talk. “Bro.” She tried to interrupt him unsuccessfully. “B-bro. Bro? MARCUS!!!” She finally shouted causing him to stop talking. “There’s not much time to explain. I need you, and my life is in danger.” With the phrase having been spoken, the line went dead. She smiled as she set the phone down.

“Did he... hang up?” Mesu asked. Riyu turned to them and nodded.

“So he’s not going to help us?” Tsuki asked.

“No he is. That thing I said, it’s something he told me to say any time I really need him. He hung up because he left immediately.”

“Where is he coming from?” Mesu asked.

“The next city over.”

“He’ll never get here in time.”

“You don’t know my brother. He’ll be here quickly, but we still need to buy some time for him to find us.” Riyu went to the window and could see the three bullies approaching her front door.

“Are you sure this will work?” Mesu asked looking over worriedly at his sister.

“Trust me, we’ll be fine if we can keep away long enough for my brother to get here.”

“So what do we do?” Riyu looked around.

“The woods are probably our best bet. They are all bigger than us so they will be slowed down more by the woods.” With that, they waited for the best time to move.

Lucario again knelt next to his sister.

1111121111111212121111112122111111222212.content:
An hour later, they were back in Riyu’s house. Marcus sat listening as the three younger ones finished telling him all that had transpired in the recent days.

“I was wrong.” Marcus began, angrily slamming his fist on his leg. “They deserved to suffer for what they did to you. The death they got was too quick.”

“I think it’s better this way.” Tsuki began, sitting up and reflecting on the days events. “We can move on quicker.”

“And you." Marcus said turning a disappointed stare on his young sister. "Why didn’t you call me after the first day? I can’t protect you if you don’t let me know.” Riyu just looked down and mumbled. Even though Mesu and Tsuki were right next to her, they couldn't make out what she said. “Come on Riyu, you need to trust me. I became strong so I could protect you.”

“I didn’t think it would get this bad and I wanted to see if I could solve it myself." Riyu said looking up, regaining some of her confidence. "But I wasn't able to. Instead I just weakly relied on my friends and got them in trouble.”

“All the more reason for you to call on me.”

“What happens if you’re gone?” Mesu said, suddenly joining the conversation as he jumped off the couch and walked up to Marcus."

“What do you mean?” Marcus said, looking irritated.

“You might be an incredibly amazing arena fighter, but let’s just say that something happens and you’re in the hospital or worse? Who protects her then? She needs to be able to defend herself. And she did great once she got some confidence." Mesu said looking down encouragingly at Riyu. "She just wasn’t stronger than an arcanine yet.” Mesu smiled. Riyu looked over at him and returned the smile. After a minute of silence, Lucario spoke again.

“Fair enough, but if it looks like you can’t handle it, please call me sooner. I don’t want anything happening to you. You’re all I’ve got left.” Riyu looked over at Marcus and nodded. “I have to go. I’m going to make sure the other bullies at your school know what happened. If anyone messes with you ever again, I’ll be surprised.” He then rubbed Riyu on the head affectionately. She playfully batted at his hand and then began to fix her fur.

"But what about the bullies and the school?" Mesu asked. "You did just kill three pokemon, granted they deserved it, and we skipped school to live. A good reason, but who will believe us?"

“You three get some rest. I’ll take care of everything else.” Marcus said before confidently walking out.

"Oh No You Don't!" as the lucario tacked the swampert in the stomach. "AAAHHHH!" Screamed Riyu in the mouth of the feraligator. "Shit!" Dragon pulse!" The lucario screamed. the feraligator fainted. "Let's go, Let's go!" The lucario said picking up Riyu and Tsuki. "You know, What are you two in this part of this marsh?" the lucario asked. "We were playing." Riyu said. "What's your name? I might seen you around the school now and the." The umbreon said. "Vincent. but call me Victor. and im gonna be a friend." Victor said with a smile. until they stoped in front of...
111112221121122.title: Victor the lucario

1111122211212.content: The Umbreon yelped as the Fraligator engulfed her whole body. Tsuki struggled, screaming to the top of her lungs as she kicked the slimy walls of the Fraligators mouth. Tsuki let out a small yelp as the Fraligators tongue slides out from under her and starts to crush her against the walls of his mouth. The Fraligator grins and thinks about if he should swallow her or chew's her.
1111122211212.title: Fraligator gets a meal.

11111222112121.content: The Feraligatr was a buit too hungry to chew after all so he just swallows the Umbreon down into his stomach. He then heads deeper into the water, wanting a swim after his meal as the Umbreon thrashes around in his stomach.
11111222112121.title: He swallows Tsuki whole

111112221121211.content:
Howls of pain come from Tsuki as they do so, and her thrashing gets stronger, but as her fur is digested and the acids begin digesting her skin, her struggles begin slowing down.

She begins blacking out too as her blood begins flowing from the open spots in her skin, and soon, she loses consciousness, falling into an endless slumber seconds later as her boduy is digested into a nutritious soup.
111112221121211.title: His acids begin digesting her

11111222112122.content:
Feraligatr lavished the taste of the small Umbreon as he held her in his mouth, lapping over the dark type's small, frail frame with his powerful tongue. He could hear her screaming as she was smashed against the walls of his mouth, desperately yelling for Riyu's help. Feraligatr almost wished that she would: two meals were always better than one.

Finally the large alligator decided he had had enough of tasting Tsuki, the motions of his tongue dying down. As she laid sprawled out on his tongue she panted and whimpered, glancing back at the entrance to the Feraligatr's gullet. Little did she know that she was in for a far worse fate than simply being swallowed alive.

It happened quickly. Feraligatr shoved Tsuki to the side of his mouth so that she lay underneath his razor-sharp teeth, swiftly snapping his jaws shut. Tsuki screamed in pain as the Feraligatr's fangs clamped down around her midsection, piercing holes through her chest. Rivulets of blood began flowing down the corner of Feraligatr's jaw as he slowly opened his mouth again, Tsuki groaning as she peered out from the jaws. Weakly begging to be let go, she tried to pull herself forward and out of Feraligatr's mouth. Before she could manage, however, Feraligatr suddenly chomped down again.

Tsuki yelped in pain, coughing up a spurt of blood as she felt Feraligatr grinding his teeth, her flesh ripping and tearing. Tears streamed from her eyes as Tsuki began to sob, Feraligatr again opening his mouth and crunching down hard. This time she could hear a distinct crunch, Tsuki finding that she could no longer feel her rear legs. The Umbreon's spine had been fractured, leaving her lower body paralyzed. As she squirmed in a pool of her own blood at the bottom of Feraligatr's mouth, she knew it would only get worse.

Feraligatr began to shift the Umbreon around between each powerful crunch, every bite eliciting another pained yelp from Tsuki. Tossed around in Feraligatr's mouth, ravaged by his sharp teeth, Tsuki was quickly looking more like a bloody lump of meat than an Umbreon. Her flesh was torn in bloody gashes all over her body, bones broken as if they were toothpicks and leaving her limbs twisted at odd angles. Barely even able to move now, Tsuki cried as she stared at the intermittently visible outside world, wondering which flash of the swamp would be her last.
11111222112122.title: Fraligator uses Crunch.

choices: Riyu runs back to the lake and atempts to swim back across.
111112221121221.content:
Tsuki's yelps of pain continued to fill the dead slient air of the swamp, makeing all the pokemon close enough to hear cringe from the blood curtaling screams. Tsuki couldn't do anything except watch as her body gets impailed over and over again by the Feraligator's long bloody teeth, and even thou her lower body is paralyzed, she couldn't help but scream just from the thought. Tsuki's black fur started turning a dark crimson red and her bright yellow rings started to die down as her life slowly slipped away from her grasp. Tsuki just continued to cry as her bloody body was tossed around the Feraligators blood stained maw. She hoped Riyu was as far away from her right now as possible so she wouldn't have to witness or experience the horrible pain she was feeling. Tsuki prayed that this would all stop and that she would be spat out and hopefully live long enough to make it to the night so she could heal a little bit under the moon light, but the bad only got worse as the Feraligators tonque tossed her body into a position, causing the back of her head to lay against the Feraligators bottom teeth. Tsuki's eye's shot wide open with terror as she watched the Feraligators top row of teeth seam to rise in slow motion, at that last second she saw Riyu out of the corner of her eye standing on a branch with a terrifide look. Tsuki watched as the Feraligator's jaw come back down to deliver the finishing blow.

Riyu watched in horror with tear drenched eyes as the jaw came back down toward Tsuki's head. Riyu quickly covered her eye's as Tsuki's last cry was cut off fallowed by a sickinning crunch. Riyu looked back and saw that the rings on Tsuki's ears that were sticking out of the Feraligators mouth were not glowing anymore and just hung limply from the beasts bloody maw with blood poreing off the tips, pooling on the ground. Riyu cried as she watched her only friend's mangeled body get tossed up and caught again by the Feraligator who then procseeded to scarf down what was left of the Umbreon.

Riyu continued to sob uncontrolably, wishing she could have done something to save her only friend, but it was to late now and there was nothing else she could do but cry and prey that Tsuki forgives her for being to scaired to do anything.
111112221121221.title: (Tsuki's end) Hard vore

choices: Riyu leaps forward to attack Feraligatr.
111112221121222.content:
“Tsuki! Tsuki, what's going on?” Riyu yelled as she frantically hopped from root to root in the direction she thought she had heard the Umbreon screaming from. It all looked the same to her though and she quickly got lost. Eventually she regained her bearings, however, quickly heading in the direction she could now hear Tsuki's increasingly panicked screaming coming from. Swinging around a tree, Riyu landed atop another exposed root only to let out a scream herself when she saw the sight before her.

A large Feraligatr stood knee high in the water, his mouth half open. Blood dripped down from inside his mouth and into the water below, Riyu's eyes drawn to the source of the blood. Inside Feraligatr's mouth Riyu could see the mangled body of an Umbreon: her friend, Tsuki. She was barely alive, but Riyu saw her friend's eyes slowly turn to look at the Riolu.

“R... Riyu...” Tsuki muttered, the effort of talking visibly hard for her. Before she could continue speaking she suddenly gagged and coughed up yet more blood to mix into what was pooled in Feraligatr's mouth. “Please... Help...”

Riyu hadn't gone unnoticed by the Feraligatr, who stopped chewing Tsuki for a moment as it examined the new arrival. Mixed with Tsuki's blood, drool began to drip from the Feraligatr's maw. On her own he knew that the Umbreon wouldn't fill him, however with the Riolu perhaps he could have a proper meal.

Riyu was frozen in place as she stared at Tsuki's broken body before flicking her eyes up to the Feraligatr's face. She recognized the look there, and hesitantly took a step back only to slip and fall off the tree root. Grabbing on to it, Riyu struggled to pull herself back up, shaking as she wondered what to do.
111112221121222.title: Riyu finally shows up.

choices: Riyu is too scared to speak.
”W...  Wait.  Maybe we could work out a deal?”
1111122211212222.content:
Riyu could only remain frozen in place, eyes locked on Feraligatr and her nearly dead friend trapped within its mouth. She could see the tears running down Tsuki's cheeks, mixing with her blood. What she couldn't hear were Tsuki's quiet whispers: pleas for Feraligatr to stop, for Riyu to help her, for some miracle to happen. Anything that would keep her from her death. Her whispers went unanswered however, Feraligatr grinning as he closed his mouth one final time.

Riyu also began to cry as she watched Tsuki disappear behind Feraligatr's jaws. Mentally she cursed herself for not helping her friend, trying to rationalize with the thought that nothing she could do would help anyway. Finding herself unable to look away even now though, she could only continue to stare at the bulge Feraligatr held in his maw.

Inside that mouth, Tsuki tried everything she could to escape. With her body mangled and twisted she could barely move though, her efforts consisting solely of painfully inching her broken front paws closer to Feraligatr's jaw. Before she could manage to grab a hold of something however, Feraligatr swiftly tilted his head upward.

“No... No...” Tsuki whimpered as she felt her body sliding down Feraligatr's tongue to the opening of his throat. Her limp tail and paws slipped into the opening first, beginning Tsuki's journey down to the pit of Feraligatr's stomach. Unable to move, Tsuki could only whimper and cry as her body was slowly ingested by the Feraligatr.

Riyu wasn't doing much better, frozen in fear as she watched the bulge slip from Feraligatr's maw and into his throat. The small Umbreon didn't take much for Feraligatr to swallow, a few gulps being all it took for Tsuki's ravaged body to slip into the alligator Pokemon's gullet.

Taking pleasure in the feeling of Tsuki sliding down his throat, Feraligatr reached up to his neck and stroked the bulge in it. Riyu whimpered as she watched the final sign of her friend slip down out of Feraligatr's neck and into his belly, bulging out slightly as Tsuki was finally deposited to her final resting place.

Finishing the first part of his meal off by gulping down the pool of blood in his mouth, Feraligatr lowered his head to look at Riyu as he licked the blood off his chin. The Umbreon had been delicious, but less than filling. This Riolu would certainly satisfy him nicely. Slowly he began to walk forward, continuing to lick his lips in hunger.

Her eyes fixated on the bulge in the Feraligatr's stomach, Riyu barely noticed the Feraligatr approaching her. She was horrified by what had happened to her friend, and further terrified at the thought of it happening to her as well; she hadn't come to this school just to be Feraligatr food. She knew she couldn't fight him one on one, but perhaps words could do more than fists in this instance.
1111122211212222.title: Riyu stands frozen in terror.

choices: No.  This one Riolu will do just fine.
11111222112122222.content:
“W... Wait...” Riyu stuttered as she fell down on the tree's root, scrambling back against its trunk as she watched the Feraligatr who had just eaten her friend Tsuki slowly approach. “P... Please... Don't eat me...”

The Feraligatr paused, tilting its head to the side slightly. Opening his mouth slowly, he first used a claw to pick off a piece of bloody flesh that clung to a tooth, examining it for a moment before snarling and flicking it into his mouth, gulping the remnant of Tsuki down.

“Why shouldn't I?” the Feraligatr deeply growled as it turned its attention back to Riyu. “The Umbreon was not filling,” he snarled, stomping though the marsh and closing the distance to Riyu surprisingly quickly. Bending down, he breathed in the Riolu's face as he let out a low growl, the small Pokémon pressing herself as tightly against the tree as possible.

Then the Feraligatr began to chuckle; a low, deep rumbling that seemed to shake the earth itself. Strands of saliva flew across Riyu's face, making her wince. “You will accompany your friend nicely,” Feraligatr laughed, examining the frightened Pokémon.

“But, wait...” Riyu whimpered. “Please, don't kill me... I have an idea...”

“An idea?” The Feraligatr burst out laughing, launching even more saliva at the trapped Riolu. “What could YOU possibly suggest? A new way to eat you?!”

“I... I came with Tsuki, the Umbreon, from this school not far from here.” Riyu began to talk fast, hoping that the wild Feraligatr would at least consider what she said. “There, at the school, there are lots of Pokémon. Plenty more, like me and Tsuki. Please, let me live and I can show you the school! Eat them, not me!” Riyu pleaded. It was her final hope; of course, if the school were to find out that she had told a wild Pokémon about it she'd be expelled. Still, better than being eaten.

Feraligatr stood up straight, lifting his face far away from Riyu for which she was grateful. “A school, you say?” he repeated thoughtfully. “And there is plenty of prey there, like you?”

“Yes,” Riyu confirmed, nodding her head vigorously. “There're all sorts of species too. Different... Flavors, I guess...” Riyu shivered at that, wondering what had made her think such a weird thought.

“What about bigger Pokémon? Other preds like me...” Feraligatr then asked.

Riyu gulped. She had been hoping he would be more focused on the small Pokémon and not those who could oppose him. “Well, there are some... I know there's this Charizard and Arcanine, and a Seviper... There're also rumors about other less conventional Pokémon, like this Flygon, but—”

“Enough,” Feraligatr snapped, interrupting Riyu. “I've made my decision.”

Shakily, Riyu pulled herself to her feet. Even standing up she was still miniscule compared to the Feraligatr, but she tried to calm herself as she looked up at the giant's face. “Sound like the sort of place you'd like to visit?”
11111222112122222.title: ”W...  Wait.  Maybe we could work out a d...

choices: Riyu's services are no longer required.  Dispose of her.
Riyu can yet help Feraligatr.  Keep her alive.
111112221121222221.content:
The moment that passed before Feraligatr delivered his answer was one of the most tense, stressful, and suspenseful moments of Riyu's life. When she finally saw Feraligatr slightly nod, his tensed up muscles that had been prepared to end her life relaxing, she let out a huge sigh of relief.

“This school of yours, you will take me there,” Feraligatr growled as he bent down and splashed some of the mucky water over himself, washing away any last remnants of Tsuki's blood and flesh. “I will let you live. For now...”

“Yes, yes, thank you... Thank you...” Riyu sighed. “I promise, they'll taste better than me anyway.”

Feraligatr grunted, but remained silent.

As Riyu glanced around to gain her bearings and work out which direction the school was in, a thought occurred to her. “When we reach the school, it would probably be a bad idea to go charging straight in and swiping up every Pokémon you see. Perhaps if you try blending in as a student...”

“I have a plan,” Feraligatr growled. He was smarter than he looked and acted, apparently.

“Well, okay. Let's go...”

So Riyu began leading the Feraligatr through the swamp and into the clear water portion of the lake. Struggling to keep up with Feraligatr as they swam through it, they eventually reached the bank Riyu remembered Tsuki having led them to earlier. Crawling on to the land, Riyu shook her fur off only to notice that Feraligatr was charging on ahead without waiting for her.

“Wait up! You'll get lost!” Riyu shouted as she ran off after him, leading the Pokémon who could easily turn on her and eat her at any second towards the Pokémon School she had just been transferred to. This wasn't how she had expected her life there to turn out, but so long as she could keep Feraligatr happy enough that he didn't turn on her, perhaps she could find a chance to get away from the place.

“There,” Riyu said as she stopped at the edge of the forest. The main building of the school was clearly visible, and Riyu could see Feraligatr's eyes flicking among the Pokémon that wandered about the campus. She noticed he seemed to pay particular attention to the larger Pokémon, a grin creeping on to his face.

“Excellent. There is great potential for my kind here, yet much work remains to be done...”
111112221121222221.title: Yes.  Feraligatr is quite interested.

choices: Feraligatr is not moved by her pleas.
Perhaps she can be helpful after all...
1111122211212222211.content:
Feraligatr suddenly whipped around, grabbing Riyu's chest with a single clawed hand and slamming her against a tree. Yelping in surprise, Riyu began to squirm as she felt Feraligatr's claws digging into the side of her chest while at the same time he pressed her against the tree with ever more pressure.

“Unfortunately, you will only get in my way from now on,” Feraligatr snickered.

“But, you said...”

“I said nothing. I let you live then; nothing said I have to let you live now.”

Riyu began to sob as she realized she had been tricked. The Feraligatr had probably never intended to let her live forever, he had just used her to find the damn school. Now she was useless to him and little more than another meal like Tsuki had been.

“Please...” Riyu cried. “I can help you blend in! I can... I can...” Riyu fell silent when she realized that she was so new to the school that she barely knew anything about it, much less anything that could help Feraligatr. “Please!” she begged one final time as Feraligatr tightened his grip on her, blood rolling down her chest from where his claws pricked her side. “I'll do whatever I can, be loyal to you forever!”
1111122211212222211.title: Riyu's services are no longer required.  Di...

choices: Crunch is still the way to go: hard.
11111222112122222111.content:
Feraligatr laughed as he tightened his grip more and pressed the Riolu against the tree even tighter, feeling bones shift in her frail body as at the same time the flesh on her sides began to split open from his claws.

“Sorry, but I have no place in my plans for a whiny prey companion.”

Riyu began to scream when she realized Feraligatr wasn't going to reconsider now. She could only hope someone would come to investigate before it was too late. Feraligatr knew he'd have to finish her off fast, but how?
11111222112122222111.title: Feraligatr is not moved by her pleas.

choices: Someone saw Feraligatr eat Riyu after all.
111112221121222221112.content:
Feraligatr fell silent as he clamped his claws down on Riyu, pulling her away from the tree as he spread his mouth wide open. The Riolu stared into the cavernous maw with terror as Feraligatr raised her up to its level, unceremoniously tossing her entire body into his gaping jaws.

The Riolu easily fit entirely inside Feraligatr's maw, just as with Tsuki before her. Riyu cried out as she tried to gain her footing on the slippery tongue, however its constant movements merely resulted in her coming crashing to her knees, sprawled out on the slimy muscle. Before she could regain her senses, Feraligatr took the first move by thrusting the Riolu to the side of his mouth. Feeling the Feraligatr's razor sharp teeth poking at her back, Riyu knew only all too well what was coming next.

A sickening crunch was heard as Feraligatr suddenly chomped down on Riyu. In that one swift bite Riyu's chest was torn open, her ribs shattered, arms and legs fractured, and blood vessels torn apart sending the fresh red liquid flying throughout Feraligatr's mouth and drizzling down his chin. As he slowly opened his jaws again, Riyu's twitching body clung to hist upper teeth until he used his tongue to slide it off, the Riolu falling limply to the bottom of Feraligatr's mouth.

She wasn't dead yet though, her head and major organs having avoided the teeth. Riyu gasped and whimpered as she stared down at her ravaged chest. Large holes remained where the fangs had literally speared her, some of the holes tunneling straight through her body to the other side. Every hole was pouring blood that gathered around Riyu in a pool, dying her blue fur a grim red. Weakly with her one good arm she reached up to her chest, whimpering as she tried to wipe the blood off her only to have it replaced by her continually bleeding wounds.

Feraligatr heard Riyu start to cry, and decided it was up to him to stop that crying soon. Tossing his head up, Riyu's body went flying into the air only to be caught in his maw again, Feraligatr immediately crunching his jaws down again. A sharp cry of pain from his mouth signaled that Riyu was still clinging on to life, so he tossed her about again, and again, and again. With each toss of her limp body and satisfying, bone-breaking, flesh tearing and bloodletting crunch her cries grew weaker and weaker, but still she struggled and fought to live.

The Riolu was now a mess, barely identifiable as a Riolu. The numerous holes in her chest had merged into several larger, jagged tears, organs and blood spilling out through them. Two of her paws had completely snapped off, ragged stumps remaining on her body while the others were twisted about in seemingly impossible ways. Still her head remained though—and her heart, although it threatened to slip out of her chest at any moment. Feraligatr decided that he had chewed Riyu up enough now, it was time to finish this meal.

Feraligatr flicked his head to the side, feeling the barely conscious Pokémon fall beneath his teeth once again. This time, though, he used his tongue to ensure Riyu's head remained there too. He could feel her struggle slightly, trying to move her head away, but it was hopeless. All she could do was let out one final scream as Feraligatr suddenly snapped his jaw closed one final time, the sickening crunch of Riyu's skull caving in the last sound she made as her screams and cries fell silent, forever.

Feraligatr licked the limp Riolu corpse for a moment before tipping his head back, feeling the lump of meat and bones fall down into his throat without resistance. Eagerly he gulped Riyu's remains down, sighing as he felt them fall into his stomach alongside the still digesting remains of the Umbreon. With the two Pokémon now in his belly he was feeling moderately full, however as he licked at the blood smeared across his chin he knew that he could always make room for more food.
111112221121222221112.title: Crunch is still the way to go: hard.

11111222112122222112.content: "ok prove it." The feraligator growled puting riyu down. "go find me some prey and you'll be my slave to your death!"He said as riyu ran off. Riyu ran though the school trying to find a meal for hear master. Soon she finds...
11111222112122222112.title: Perhaps she can be helpful after all...

111112221121222221121.content:
"Erm...excuse me."
The Eevee looked up as she heart the soft voice calling her. She had been taking a nice nap under a rosebush, and wasn't necessarily thrilled about being woken up. "Yeah, what is it?" She asked a little too gruffly. She regretted it immediately when she saw the riolu that had called her cringe. She sighed a little and thought 'freshmen!' Before continuing. "Erm...sorry, didn't sleep much last night. Did you want something?"
Riolu looked at her up and down, and guiltily ran down a checklist in her head. She was small...admittadly cute, and...did she look tasty? She started talking to the Eevee, telling her that she needed someone to help her go into the woods to find her little brother. The eevee was concerned, and readily agreed to help. "Just lead the way!" She said as she got up. Riolu began to lead her back to her new master, with guilt churning in her stomach. She didn't know this pokemon very well, but she seemed nice...but also tasty. If she brought her to her master, he would surely be pleased enough to spare her life! Riyu suffered the most violent battle of will she had ever endured, and before she knew it, she was almost to the Feraligator. Should she lead this innocent to slaughter? Or save her skin and be made a slave?
111112221121222221121.title: a female eevee.

1111122212.content:
Riyu sat outside at the bottom of the school steps, waiting patently for Tsuki to meet up with her. Right after they finished their battle, Tsuki told her to meet her outside of the school so she could take her to a spot she discovered while exsploring the woods last sunday." Hey Riyu! Are you ready to go!" Riyu looked over her shoulder to see Tsuki walking down the huge concreat stairs. Riyu noded and picked up her bookbag, ready to head off. "Follow me then!" Tsuki said as she headed off towards the back of the school. Riyu quickly ran to Tsuki's side and they started to talk about there day.

The two, soon arived to the edge of the woods, located behind the school. "Follow my lead!" Tsuki said before disapearing into the over grown vegitation. Riyu quickly followed in right behind her, disapearing from the view of any pokemon that could be watching. Riyu followed everyone of Tsuki's movements as the umbreon weaved throught the brush, relatively quickly, almost leaving her behind. The two soon came to an opening in the woods and there before them stood a huge cave. Riyu just stared at the dark mouth of the cave nervously as the aproched it. The two slowly walked into the cave. Unlike the little riolu, Tsuki was excited to be in the cave and eagerly walked in further, but then again she is a dark type and she has been in this cave twice scence she found it. Tsuki stopped and waited for Riyu who was still a little uneasy about coming in. As Riyu approched Tsuki she noticed that there was a rather deep pool of water in the corner of the cave." There is a small little tunnel big enought for us to swim through in that little pound over there and it leads to another section of the cave... It's not a very long tunnel an you could probably swim through it to the other side in 3 seconds." Tsuki said a little excitedly. "But if you want, we can just continue throught that smaller tunnel ahead of us." Tsuki said pointing to a smaller tunnel in the corner with her tail.
1111122212.title: The Cave

11111222121.content:
Riyu curiousity got the better of her as she wanted to see what was on the otherside of the cave wall that the underwater tunnel led too. Riyu points to the water. "All right then, lets jump in!" Tsuki said speeding past Riyu and jumping of an overhang into the water. Riyu laughted as she was splashed by the water. Riyu's soon forgot about her worries and quickly jumped of the same overhang, into the water, landing right next to Tsuki. After having a little water war for about three minutes, the two headed to the spot where the underwater tunnel is."Okay, all you have to do is swim forwerd until you reach a wall and turn left, then after you swim another 7 feet, go up." Tsuki said. Riyu nodded, signaling that she understood. "Remeber not to go right when you need to go left." Tsuki said just before going under.

Riyu waited about 2 minutes before taking a deep breath and going under. She was shocked by how amazingly clear the water was as she slowly took her time swimming through the little cave, but what amazed her the most was the glowing algie on the cave wall that lit up the tunnel. {This is definitly one of the coolest things I have ever seen} she thought as she got to the split.

Tsuki is not quick enough to save her.                          Digestion
1111122212111.content: Riyu continued to drift throught the water as she slowly swam right, not realizing she took a wrong turn for she was to caught up in the moment. Riyu's attintion was suddenly redirected when she saw something move further down the tunnel. She tried to see past some of the shadows the jagged rock walls were casting but it was to dark. Suddenly, small glowing orb appeared no more than ten feet away from her. She could tell almost instintly that it wasn't the algie growing on the wall. An uneasy felling started to form in her head. Then all of a sudden, the orb started to increase in brightness and come towards her quickly. Riyu's eyes shot open and herr heart dropped as the orb became bright enought to see the face of a lanturn, speeding towards Riyu with it's mouth wide open, ready to swallow her whole. All she had time to do was put her arms and front of her and scream relesing a cloud of bubbles, as the lanturns giant mouth, engulfed her whole body in one bite. Riyu kicked frantickly against the walls of the lanturns mouth in her attempt to escape as she lost most of her air when she screamed. The lanturn smiled as he enjoyed the struggle of his latest meal, licking the frantic riolu all over, savouring her. The lanturn quickly squrted the water out of his mouth, giving Riyu a chance to finally breath after almost drowning. Riyu continued to scream for help as she beated on the walls of her predators mouth. The lanturn licked her face, savoring the tears of fear rolling down her face. Riyu lets out another scream as the back of the lanturns throat opens up, grabbing a hold of her tail and pulling her down its tight throat with amazing speed, quickly depositing her into its stomach which turns out to be umbearibly tight. She screamed once more as the stomach contracted around her almost crushing her to death. She felt some kind of strange liquid run down her face, which she soon realized was it's stomach acids. The stomach contracted once more making her scream in pain, and it once again created more acid. She continued to try and struggle once more. The lanturn smiled as he relaxed and enjoyed the riolu's futile struggles and cries of pain as its stomach continued to contract around her fragile body. "HUH boy!" Luke says. "Uh-huh! That's right!" Karen says mischeviously. "You want freedom, you'll have to EARN it!" "But I don't WANT freedom anymore!" Luke explains. "Good. Then you'll love this. Lay back." she says with a hint of energy in her voice. Luke did as he was told. As he lay back, Karen started to stroke his member. Luke can't help but smile. "You're such a big boy!" she coos. Luke's tail is wagging very fast now, as Karen lays on her back. "commere." she beckons to the Riolu. Karen starts to moan with pleasure as Luke climbs onto her. The two start to pant as Luke starts to moan.

The two are kissing and panting as Luke bucks his hips, getting more and more aroused. Just then, he reaches his climax. Luke screams with ecstasy as he explodes into Karen. She screams soon after, reaching HER climax. Panting and sweating, they start to slow their pace. "Never been a pet before, but I like it." The little Riolu says with a smirk. Still panting, the Lucario sighs. "That was amazing!" they both look at each other, then The bell rings. "Oh, crap! It's THAT time ALREADY!?!" Karen shouts. They get themselves cleaned up. "We'll never get to class on time!" Luke cries.
The late bell rings, as the worried little Riolu cries out: "What are we gonna DO?!?" Karen grins, with determination in her eyes. She turns to Luke.

"Luke, you'd better be okay with this." she says. "What?" Luke asks. The Lucario tells the desperate Riolu her plan to get past the tardy sweeps.
What's the plan?
1121311211211.title: She is feeling frisky

choices: Or being carried in Karen's belly?
11213112112112.content:
"well, you could carry me on your shoulders, like before, only act like you hate it. They'll think I'm punishing you." Karen thinks. Luke smiles a devilish grin. "That could work." Luke had gotten used to carrying the Lucario, and he actually enjoys how she praises him for it. "But you gotta act like you're struggling, though." Karen says. "Yeah, that might be tough." Luke replies.

"Or... I could carry you, if ya know what I mean." the Lucario says with a twinkle in her eye. Luke knew exactly what she meant as she grins once more. "OH no! PLEASE no! Anything but THAT!" Luke stammers. "what, widdle baby doesn't wanna get his poor widdle paws wet?" she taunts him.
"NO! I actually could get used to being in there, it's just that..." Luke's voice trails off. "just What?" the Lucario asks.

"I'm afraid you'll forget about me being in there." Luke says, voice shaking and eyes watering. "it's dark in there, and I don't wanna become..." Luke shudders. He looks up into the Lucario's understanding eyes. "there's a bathroom right by our class, I'll spit you up there." she explains.

Which idea do they go with?
11213112112112.title: Or get Luke to carry her around, or vice versa ...

choices: "Can you teach me that song you were singing?"
112131121121121.content:
Luke tries his best to keep himself from getting eaten again, so he tries to strike a deal with Karen.
"If we do the plan in which I carry YOU, I'll... Uh..." Luke thinks. Karen's eyes sparkle once again. "How about if You carry ME, then you have to... Take me to Dinner at a fancy place AND finish my foot rub." she says with a giggle. "ANYTHING to keep me from getting eaten again." Luke begs.

Karen smiles. "Okay. But after school today, I want to start it off with the foot rub so I don't forget. I'll never forget the fancy meal." Luke nods. as long as he doesn't have to spend five minutes in her belly. "Let's get to it!" the Lucario says. "carry me." Luke smiles as he lets her sit on his shoulders.

Luke bursts through the door as he starts speedwalking to class. "Uh-oh. Tardy sweep. Slow down." the Lucario says. The Riolu slows down and starts to stagger. "Aw, it hurts!" Luke says with feeling. "Too bad, kid. You're lucky you're not getting detention!" Karen says. The tardy sweep nods and walks on. "Good acting, Luke." Karen whispered. "who was that?" the Riolu says. "That Lucario? You don't remember the guy that stopped you this morning?" she replies. "Oh. I remember, now." Luke shudders as he walked on, with Karen humming a tune to pass the time. The Lucario looks down at the Riolu, who is starting to look drowsy. "Hee hee! I gotta stop singing that song" Karen says with a smile. They reach the class. The last one of the day, and Luke is looking forward to it. He sits next to Karen, who is waiting. Class starts as Luke passes Karen a note this time. It reads...
112131121121121.title: "punished Luke"

choices: ...it goes in perfect harmony with my voice?"
1121311211211211.content:
Karen reads the note and blushes. "Nobody ever asks me about my song." she writes back.
"Well, I think it's pretty." Luke writes to her. "Really? Do you REALLY want me to teach you that song?" Karen writes back. "Of course!" Luke writes back with a smile. They're perfectly safe from the teacher in the back of the room in the corner, and safe they were, the teacher was oblivious to their note-passing. He blabbed on and on about the history of pokémon and the greatest battles of all time.

The Riolu smiles as he waits for the Lucario to write him back. Just then, a note is placed on his desk. Karen stares at him with excitement as Luke reads the little piece of paper. "Tell me why you want me to teach you my song." it read. Luke smiles as he writes back: "I like how..."
1121311211211211.title: Looks like Karen's got a fan of her music!

choices: Rushed at him with open jaws (it was a trap)
Rushed at him with open arms! (she was sincere!)
11213112112112111.content:
"Well, I like how I fall asleep every time you sing it." Luke says. Karen looks hurt. "Is my song just a lullaby to you?" she looks like she's fighting back tears. "I taught myself that song! It's my own masterpiece! And you treat it like a stupid lullaby?!?" Luke looks into Karen's eye's and sees not a sparkle, but a flame. "Uh-oh, she's pissed." Luke thinks to himself.

"You can bet your ass I'm pissed!" the Lucario says with a growl. "Listen, it's not what you think." Luke stammers. "I thought you cared about me." she sniffles. "I do! It's just-" Luke is cut off by Karen, who held up her paw, but put it down soon after. "was she going to hit me?" Luke thinks to himself. Karen glares at Luke, who shrinks back into his seat. He never took his eyes off of the hurt Lucario. She sniffles as she turns away. Just then, a meowth, who happened to sit next to the Riolu, turns to him. "Girl problems?" he asks. "Yup." Luke replies in a quiet voice. The meowth looks up just in time to see Karen pull her lips back in a snarl. "Dude, what'd you DO to her?" he asks Luke.

"All I said was that I liked how her singing puts me to sleep..." the Riolu says in a confused tone. "Listen, kid. You're NEVER supposed to tell a woman that her singing puts you to sleep. It makes 'em mad." the meowth says, quite nervous. "How come they get mad?" Luke asks. "It just does..." the meowth says. Karen's paws clench into fists as she furiously scribbles notes that are on the blackboard. Luke gulps hard and says to himself: "I'm royally screwed." a note lands on his desk. "oh, boy..." he sighs.

He opens the note. It reads:
Luke,

I'm sorry I went a little nuts earlier, I should let more things go. That's why I want to talk to you face to face in the bathroom after school.
By tomorrow, all this'll be a funny memory.
Sincerely yours,
Karen

Luke was so happy to find out that she's giving him a second chance, he smiled as he waited for the bell...
Once it rang, he ran to the bathroom to find Karen. He rushed to her with open arms, as with Karen...
11213112112112111.title: Smooth move, genius...

11213112112112112.content:
Karen smiles ear to ear as she writes in big letters and holds the paper up: "YES" Luke almost springs out of his chair, but he was held back by his desk. It made a crash as the Teacher, a Blazekein turns around. "Something wrong, Luke?" he asks.
Luke thinks and finally stammers: "Uh... I just... I just saw a spider crawl on my... Uh. Foot." Luke hears muffled guffaws and some snickering in the classroom. "Luke, suck it up, be a big boy, and kill the damn thing. Don't be a little girl." the teacher sighs. A few of the girls glared at the teacher when he said this, but he didn't care. Luke looks at him and smirks. "sir, the spider is in your feathers." the teacher starts smacking his head. "Did I kill it?" Luke holds back a smirk. "Uhhh... Nope, still there." the teacher starts smacking himself all over. "Get it off me!" he cries out. Almost in stiches, Karen waves him on. "Yup, you got it!" Luke says with a huge smile. Just then, the bell rang as everyone went to their lockers. "That was HILARIOUS!!!" Karen exclaims. Luke felt proud of himself as he saved the class from homework. "My first act of justice!" Luke sighs in relief as he smiles.
11213112112112112.title: ...it goes in perfect harmony with my voice?"

choices: Time to sing, then it's bedtime.
112131121121121121.content:
As the two walk out of the school, Karen turns to Luke and smiles.

"You wanna practice the song while we walk to my house?" she asks.

"Sure. It'd be an honor." Luke replies with a smile so bright that it made the sun jealous.
The two walk hand-in-hand happily.

"So... How does the song go again?" Luke asks as he looks hopefully at the Lucario, who is blushing.
She never had a fan before, and it made her feel warm and fuzzy inside.

She smiles and starts to sing:

"Seeing you and me, for all the world to see
for all eternity. how did it come to be?
Alone in this place, I start to see your face.
I'll never give up the chase...

You're what makes the sun so bright
you're the reason the stars shine at night
you showed me you care, another thought to share.
In front of me, a face so fair? A love like this is oh so rare"

by the end of the song, Luke shed a tear.

"It... It was beautiful..." he sniffed. The Riolu found himself being lifted into the Lucario's arms.

Karen smiled. "I wanted to sing it to someone I cared about that I trust."

Luke smiled. "I guess I'm the one, right?" Karen giggled as she gently kissed Luke on the cheek.

"Of course you are." she whispered.

With Luke in her arms, Karen walked home. She greeted her family and headed to her room.
The Riolu sat up and looked around the room. It was a cozy spot, with a very comfortable bed.

"You like it?" Karen asked.

"Yes. It's very nice." Luke answered.
112131121121121121.title: To Karen's house! Sleepover!!!

1121311211211211211.content:
Karen laughed as Luke tried to sing along. The Riolu was doing great at first, but then bombed it. Luke, feeling frustrated, went limp. The Lucario looks at the stressed Riolu, feeling simpathetic.

"What's the matter? Too hard?" Luke nodded in defeat, eyes to the floor. Karen sat down next to him and puts her arm around his shoulder. Luke looks up to meet her gaze, but looks away soon after. He shakes his head in sorrow.

"I made a mockery of your song..." Luke frowns, waiting for her response.

"No, you're just learning, that's all. Everyone makes mistakes!" Karen says reassuringly. She gives the Riolu a warm hug.

Luke looks back up to the Lucario's glistening red eyes and gives a little smile. He leaned up against Karen's soft, blue fur and looks up.
Karen strokes the Riolu's fur. "I love it when you do that." she purrs.

A smile spread across Luke's face. Feeling more confident, he asks Karen if she could help him with her song.

"Five more minutes. After that, we gotta get ready for bed." Karen says, giving in to his pleads.

Karen starts to sing, Luke repeating after her, word for word. The Lucario was happy to see that she can enjoy her masterpiece with someone.

After five quick minutes...
1121311211211211211.title: Time to sing, then it's bedtime.

choices: They woke up and got to school just in time?
11213112112112112111.content:
"Alright, we gotta go to sleep. Brush your teeth, do whatever you gotta do before you sleep." Karen says to Luke, enjoying the fact that she can boss him around.

"But, what about dinner?" Luke asks, stomach growling. A thin line of drool started to travel down his chin. The last thing he ate was the cafeteria food, but it wasn't that filling.

The Lucario's stomach also started to make noises. She laughed and blushed at the sound.

"I guess we can have a bit of food before bed. My parents won't mind." Karen giggled as she lead the hungry Riolu into the kitchen.
The two eagerly searched for food. Luke calls out to Karen.

"Uh, How about this?" The Riolu holds out a plate of meat of some sort.

"You like the taste of pidgey, too?" Karen asks, eyes lighting up. Luke looks down at the plate, which is covered with drumsticks.

"Uh, okay. Let's eat!" Luke says, wondering what a pidgey tastes like. His mouth starts to water with saliva, which starts to drip down his chin once again. He watches as Karen starts to heat it up on the stove.

The two sit down as Karen evenly distributes the drumsticks. Eyes lighting up, Luke stares at the food in front of him, he thanks Karen and takes a bite. The Riolu savored the pidgey meat, enjoying every bite. His taste buds went wild due to the indescribable flavor. The warm, steamy goodness made him smile once more. He'd never had Pidgey before, and he enjoyed every piece.

After the meal, the two brushed their teeth and went to bed.

"You can sleep at the foot of my bed if you want." Karen pats the bed, waiting for Luke to lay down. He was hesitant, but then climbed onto the bed. He curled up at the foot of the bed, like a puppy. A while later, Karen started to doze off, but Luke couldn't sleep. He crawled up to where the Lucario was sleeping. He sat next to Karen and nudged her. She slowly opened one of her eyes, smiled, and grabbed Luke. The Lucario opened the covers, tucked the sleepy Riolu in, and cuddled up. The two fell asleep happily.

The next day...
11213112112112112111.title: How about a midnight snack?

112131121121121121112.content:
The Riolu opened his eyes slowly, wondering what time it was. Turning to Karen, he poked her.

"Huh? What is it?" she asked groggily. Her eyes widened as she looked at the bright sun.

"Oh crap! We're late! It must be at LEAST 8:30!" the Lucario shouts as she leaps out of bed.
The two sprint out the door and race to the school.

"oh, great. It's gonna be just like yesterday." Luke thought to himself. He didn't want to think about getting hunted by tardy sweeps, but the thought kept coming back.

"Shoot! We forgot about breakfast, and now I'm hungry." Karen looked around, then looked at the Riolu.

"Woa woa woa woa! We can stop for breakfast at the cafeteria before we get to class!" Luke said warily. He didn't feel comfortable when Karen looks at him after complaining about hunger.

The Lucario laughed. "Did you Really think I'd eat YOU? That's funny!" Luke grabbed an apple from a nearby tree and gave it to her, hoping that she'd be happy for now. And she was.

"you're so thoughtful, Luke. We should do this more often." Karen munched on the apple for a bit before they got to the school. As soon as they burst through the door, they walked down the hall and turned the corner, just then, Karen's ears perked up.

"Hurry. Get your stuff and let's go, unless you wanna relive yesterday morning!" the Lucario whispered.
Luke remembered yesterday morning, starting off with getting stopped by a Lucario who fought over him before chasing him down the hall.
He quickly opened his locker and snagged his stuff up before shutting his locker with his foot. They quickly walked down the hall as Luke struggled with his backpack. Karen grabbed his stuff, crammed it in his bag, and slung it back onto his shoulders.

The two came to an intersection. Do they...
112131121121121121112.title: Hurry, hurry, hurry!

choices: Become a tardy sweep. (WAY TO GO, LUKE!!!)
1121311211211211211122.content:
Luke and Karen turn the corner, But a Lucario spots them, and walks over to them. The Riolu remembered THIS guy, he's the Lucario who stopped him yesterday. The Tardy sweep folded his arms.

"I thought the next kid you got was mine?" he asked nonchalantly. Luke saw where this was going, and it worried him. He prepared to run for cover.
Karen quickly made a witty excuse to save the shaking Riolu.

"no no no... You got this all wrong! I'm showing this kid the ropes on how to be a tardy sweep! Isn't that right, Luke?" the Riolu looked at the Lucario, who is looking at him expectantly.

"Uh, yeah." he answered, playing along.. "so if a kid is in the halls after the late bell, we take them to the office?" Luke asks an obvious question, but trying to sound convincing was hard. Especially when he's trying to convince a pokémon who is usually smarter than his species.

Karen laughed, seeing that he's trying hard, she puts on a show.

"No, silly! You punish them! If they're bigger than you, give them a detention!"
the two keep this routine up, asking questions and answering questions. A bead of sweat forms on Luke's forehead, showing nervousness.

The Lucario chuckles. "Alright, fine. Keep up the good work, Karen! And as for the kid, welcome to the team!"
Luke and Karen let out a sigh of relief as the tardy sweep walked down the hall.

"That's Hector. We were lucky to convince him so easily!" Karen breathed. "If we wanna convince him every time, you gotta REALLY become a tardy sweep!"

Luke thought for a moment. If he became a tardy sweep, he'd have to leave Karen's side once in a while, and that isn't good for him.
But he also gets respect from other students and recognized by all the Riolus and Lucarios in the school.
Then Luke thought about staying a normal student: if he stays, he'll be able to use the crowd of pokémon to avoid being hunted by predators.
The bad part is, he'll have all his classes, and he'd still have to worry about being late.

Luke decides to...
1121311211211211211122.title: Decisions, decisions...

11213112112112112111222.content:
Luke thinks for a moment before finally deciding.

"I'm in!" he smiles and nods. Karen grabs the Riolu's paw and leads him to the office. A tall Empoleon looks at Karen, then at Luke.

"Mmm? Late student, I assume?" he asks.
The Lucario smirks as Luke rolls his eyes.

"No, Mr. Flippers. This boy wants to be a tardy sweep." Karen replies matter-of-factly.
The Riolu's eyes dart up to the Empoleon, who is looking him over.

"Hmmm... You've got the looks. But do you have the speed?"

"Yes. He outran us-I mean a couple of bullies quite easily." Karen hoped that Mr. Flippers wouldn't catch on. luckily, he didn't.

"Bullies, you say? And what were they?" the Empoleon asks, glancing at Luke, who was quickly thinking of fast Pokémon at the moment.

"They were, uh... Luke, what chased you yesterday? You reported SOMEONE to me yesterday." Karen asked, being very persuasive.
Luke's mind raced, until suddenly...

"Electrike! Two electrike chased me!" he blurted out.
With that, Mr. Flippers was convinced.

"Alright, welcome to the team!" The Empoleon laughed as he handed Luke a sash and a badge. "Wear them with pride."
Luke was grinning ear to ear. Speechless, he gave Karen a hug and managed to utter out a thank-you.

"Alright, now! No mushy stuff here. Do that in the counselor's office!" Mr. Flippers laughed as the two walked out of his office.
Just then...
11213112112112112111222.title: Where do I sign?

112131121121121121112221.content:
Luke peered up at Karen, who was staring down the hall. Her blank stare told Luke that she was thinking deeply.

"What are you thinking about?" he asked the Lucario. She soon snapped out of her trance-like state. Karen looked down at the curious Riolu, who was looking at her expectantly, waiting for an answer.

"Uh, nothing... I was just daydreaming." she bluffed. She hoped Luke wouldn't catch on, but he did.

"C'mon. Tell me the truth. What'cha thinking about?" Luke pestered Karen as they stood in the hallway. The Lucario finally gave in.

"Fine. I was thinking if we should've taken the second period shift." she sighed. "I was hoping I wouldn't have to tell you."

Luke's curiosity got the best of him, and he felt compelled to ask why it was a bad idea. Karen shook her head.

"I just can't tell you. C'mon, we gotta look for students wandering the halls." the Lucario said with a frown on her face.
Luke saw how Karen was acting, and it made him wonder what she was keeping from him. He decided to stay close to her for a while, watching her every move.

They soon started patrolling the halls. The Riolu looked up at the Lucario, who was grinding her teeth. He kept a mental note on this, but figured it was just determination.
After walking a few feet, Karen stopped and told Luke to walk down a separate hall. He looked down the long hallway, which branched off a lot.

As Luke walked down the hall, he heard footsteps. They sounded close together, so he figured it must be on four legs. The nervous Riolu slowly walked down the hall and turned to see a Poochyena, who was wandering the halls.

"Hey, you! Do you have a hall pass?" he called out. He quickly walked over to meet the dark-type pokémon.
112131121121121121112221.title: Wait, so we're basically hall monitors?!?

choices: Meh, Fine. But I get to call you something dumb, then!
1121311211211211211122212.content:
The poochyena turns around and looks at Luke, his tail drooped and he let his head hang. The scruffy-haired dark type stammered:

"I-I don't have a hall pass. This is my second day, b-but they changed my schedule this morning." he said, tears in his eyes.

Luke stared at the timid poochyena, trying to figure out what to do. If he gives the little guy a detention, the poochyena will be devastated; but he can't eat him, because the Riolu knows what it feels like to be eaten alive. This put Luke in a tight spot. He turned to the shaking dark-type and calmy said:

"Listen, I know how you feel. I was caught by a tardy sweep before, too. I was chased down the hall, then I hid in the garden, and I was... Um... Caught, If you know what I mean. I'll give you three choices: a detention, leave you for another tardy sweep, Or I can help you to your class."

The poochyena immediately said:

"Choice number three, please. You seem nice, but what is your name?"

The Riolu smirked and replied:

"My name's Luke. Rules around here: Don't report other students, they'll get you back somehow. Another thing, try to avoid the bigger pokemon unless they're friendly, which is not likely, but hey, you might get lucky!"

the Poochyena nodded slowly, showing he understood. Soon, Luke heard padded feet coming down the hallway. He turned, but nobody was there. The Riolu heard Karen's voice.

"Oh, Lukey! I hear you, kiddo! Don't go anywhere, cause I need to talk to you!"

Luke gasped. He thought to himself:

"What do I do? She's coming! If she sees this kid, he's doomed! I gotta do something!"

the Riolu then turned to the Poochyena.

"Sorry, I gotta do this! Don't hate me for this!"

Luke opened his mouth wide and stuffed the shaking pup's head into his mouth. Quickly swallowing half of the Poochyena's body, then stuffed the rest of him into his mouth, swallowing soon after. The fur tickled on the way down, and Luke enjoyed it. Karen soon walked up to the Riolu, who was out of breath because of eating so fast.

"Hey, Luke! I was walking down the hall and I heard you talking to someone, who was it? Some sorry pokemon?"

Luke looked down at his midsection.

"Uh, yeah. He was pretty tasty, actually. By the way, Why'd you call me 'Lukey' as you walked down the hall?"

Karen stopped to remember, then she laughed.

"Oh, that? Well, that's you pet name I gave you! Ha ha ha! You like it?"

Luke thought for a moment. What does Luke say?
1121311211211211211122212.title: Decisions, decisions...

11213112112112112111222121.content:
Luke and Karen were talking as they walked down the hall. Karen turned to Luke, eyeing him expectantly.

"Well?" she asked.

Luke was confused. He cocked his head sideways.

"Uh, is there a problem?" he asked.

The Lucario frowned. Luke thought for a moment. As he thought, he came up with a few solutions: She is wondering what he was up to, or she's expecting him to do something. Karen piped up:

"Aren't you going to give ME a name?" she asked.

The Riolu thought for a bit. 'Honey' is too often used, but it DOES show affection. Luke rubbed the back of his head. Karen smirked. She stroked the fur on his head and spoke.

"I'll give you time to think, kiddo. By the way, first period's almost over, I'll be in the restroom, washing my paws and my...*ahem*, behind. Slipping on a wet floor gets you dirty, let alone the fact that it's humiliating. Thank goodness nobody was around to see me!"

The Lucario tussled the fur on Luke's head and walked into the restroom. Luke snickered when Karen was out of sight and earshot. The Riolu walked down the hallway that his next class was in, so he wouldn't have to avoid the larger Pokemon. Luke saw a large, muddy puddle further down the hall and laughed.

"That must be where Karen slipped!" he thought.

Luke heard the Poochyena's voice.

"Can you let me out, now?"

The Riolu thought. If he let him out, he would be hungry, but if he doesn't let him out, all Luke will feel and hear for a while is muffled screams and kicking.

"Eh, I don't think so. You were pretty tasty, I gotta admit, boy!" Luke pat his belly.

"My name's Tyler! Don't call me 'boy!' or else!" the Poochyena screams.

Luke smiles evilly.

"Or else what? You're at my mercy, kid!"

Tyler screamed as he kicked. Luke smiled as he rubbed his belly. He started to think for a second.
He's just as bad as the predators around here! He smirked, though.

"Eh, Tyler might be the first and last Pokemon I'll ever eat. Maybe. Heh heh heh!"

soon, the bell rang. Tyler screamed faintly:

"Let me out! I don't wanna die!"

Luke smirked as he walked to class.

"Then you'd better hope your paws work, cause those paws are the only thing that will get you out!" he laughed.

soon, he walked into the classroom and sat next to Karen. Is this class status problems 101 or special abilities?
11213112112112112111222121.title: Did I forget something? Aw, well.

112131121121121121112221212.content:
Luke walked into the classroom labeled 'Special Abilities' on the door. With a hop, skip, and a jump, Luke happily entered the classroom. There were LOTS of pokemon here, and they were all staring awkwardly at Luke. The Riolu blushed. Skipping wasn't the best thing to do... Especially when you enter a high school classroom filled with other pokemon.

"Well well well. Everybody say hi to Skippy. Take your seat, Skippy." a voice emitted from behind him.

Luke turns around only to see his teacher, Mr. Wyvern. The Garchomp stood over Luke. This guy was pretty intimidating! Luke turns around to see the entire class eyeing him, which only made Luke blush even more. Covering his face, the Riolu moaned.

"Ohhh. This sucks." Luke whined, his face as red as a beet.

"Something wrong, skips? You don't look so good." The Garchomp asks.

Thoughts raced through Luke's mind. If he said he's fine, and that he's just embarassed, the whole class would laugh at him, but if he lied, that would make him feel funny in his gut. Nobody wants to get laughed at, though! Swallowing his embarassment, Luke replied:

"Yeah, I'm fine, just a horrible headache. It goes away every so often."

Luke turns to see two spots that are open for him. One by a Glaceon, and one by a Blastoise. Where does Luke sit?
112131121121121121112221212.title: Take a seat.

1121311211211211211122212121.content:
"Uhhhh, I'll sit over there." Luke mumbled pointing to the seat next to Glaceon. Away from the Blastoise. The Riolu made his way through the stares of his fellow Poke-class mates. He could swear most of them had evil intent in their eyes. Luke felt a bit of relief when he made it to his window seat.

He stared on ahead. If he pretends to be comfortable, people would just ignore. And they did. As time moved on, the class lost their interest in him and focus back at the teacher. But Luke couldn't make sense of the lessons. All this 'Special Ability' was over the top for a Riolu.

Luke sat there in confusion. He glance at the clock and can't wait for the class to be over so he could go back being Karen's pet. In the middle of his thoughts, a cold paw tapped on his thigh. Luke jumped at the touch and hit his desk. A Lopunny named Luna turn around in her chair. Luke smiled apologetically at her and the Lopunny turn away from him. Lopunny looked over at the empty desk next to him. She frown and look back at the front of the class. The Riolu was glad that the Lopunny wasn't angry and he look for what ever touched him.

The female Glaceon also been troubling over the lesson. She is a complete airhead so she thought she should play a game. But games are no fun by yourself. Looking around, she saw the Riolu glancing at the clock a lot. He too must have given up on following the lesson. She thought at first to shake his shoulders to get his attention but then her mind wander to surprising him as part of a game. She silently got off her cushion and crawl under Luke's desk. "My name's Arbok. Yeah, it's weird, but I like having my name the same as my species. I have a friend who might like you. Her name's Seviper. Don't worry. I'll introduce you." Arbok giggled again.

Luke was talking to Arbok when a Seviper slithered over. Her red eyes were piercing, and it made Luke nervous. The black serpent approached Luke slowly, as if to add to the intimidation factor. She wasn't as big as Arbok, around 6 or 7 feet long. Arbok, who was about 15 feet long, made seviper seem small. Seviper's tongue flickered in and out.

"Who's this, Arbok? I can smell his fear and... He looks oh, so delicious." she said with a pleased groan.

Arbok coiled around Luke, her body completely engulfing him. He was trapped. At Arbok's mercy, he was helpless. The Riolu shook with fear, thinking he was doomed.

"This is Luke. He's a friend. We don't eat friends, Seviper." Arbok replied.

Luke almost started to cry now. As Arbok spoke, she wrapped around him tighter and tighter, crushing the Riolu. As Luke squeaked in pain, Arbok relaxed her muscles and spoke in a soothing voice.

"Oh, you poor thing. Hush now, it'll be okay. Relaxssssss..." she spoke, drawing out the "S" sound in "Relax" as if that would calm Luke down.

Luke closed his eyes and curled up. Arbok hissed gently to try to soothe him. Luke closed his eyes and sighed. Arbok gave Luke his food as the Riolu ate and fell asleep in Arbok's coils.
11213112112112112111222121221111.title: Having lunch, or BEING lunch?

choices: "Because you are gonna need that energy when digestion sets in...."
112131121121121121112221212211111.content:
Luke looked around, he knew for sure he was definitely inside someone. He started panicking and struggled.

"Oh are you awake sleepyhead?" Luke could hear the voice of Arbok speak to him.

"A-arbok? I knew it! Of course you would eat me!" Luke struggles more.

"Oh silly, relax! You should have know when i gave you my food! What else would I have eaten?"

Arbok giggles a bit, Luke sat dumbfounded.

"But why? You seemed so nice, I thought we could be friends!" Luke starts to tear up.

*She sighs* "Relaxssssss. You don't need to fight."

"Why shouldn't I? I'm going to die!" Luke says.
112131121121121121112221212211111.title: Luke wakes up in Arbok's belly

choices: Yes! Time to do a demonstration
No. (Whew, you sure dodged a bullet there, Luke)
112131121121121121112221212211112.content:
Luke wakes up with a startled jump as the bell rings. Looking around, he quickly walks out of the lunchroom. On to Breeding 101. Arbok quickly caught up to the Riolu.

"Wait, YOU'RE going to Breeding 101 TOO? Heh, we're like class partners or something! Sit by me and Seviper. Wait, sit between us so you're right in the middle!" Arbok beams as Luke walks to class.

As Luke enters the classroom, A Gardevoir smiles and tells him to pick a seat. Luke turns to see four empty seats. Three in the back row and one just in front of those seats. Luke sits in the middle seat between Arbok and Seviper. Just then, Karen enters the room. She sits right in front of Luke.

"Where were you during lunch? I was looking for you. What are you doing with these serpentine, forked tongued, troublemakers?" Karen silently barks.

The Riolu becomes quiet.

"Um, I was... Well, you know..." Arbok butts in and sticks up for Luke.

"He shouldn't be taking your garbage like this. If he wants to sit by us, he is fully welcome; and we are NOT troublemakers!" Arbok hissed.

Luke frowns. This was bad either way. If Karen loses the argument, she'll be mad at Luke. If Arbok loses, Luke will probably end up being lunch. The Riolu pipes up:

"Girls! I can explain everything! I'm not going to take this crap! I understand that Karen is mad, but I couldn't find you. Arbok looked lonely, so I sat by her. If I can't make both of you happy, then that's your problem. I'm trying to be friendly, but if I have to act like a dirtbag, then I will. Listen, I can make it up to you. If you can get along, I would be grateful."

Karen and Arbok were quiet for a second, then Seviper whisered:

"kid's got a point. There's no use arguing over something stupid like this."

Luke smiled at Seviper. Granted, she can be intimidating and scary, but she means well. Luke sits in class as the Gardevoir said in a singsong voice:

"Okay, class. My name is Miss Susanne. Today we're learning about seduction." the Gardevoir smiles happily.

The class was mostly quiet except for a few snickers and muffled guffaws. Seduction may be considered 'teasing' in a way that makes the opposite gender want more. Arbok smirks at Luke, who blushed. Karen also stared at the Riolu. This made Luke uneasy. He thought to himself that as long as Miss Susanne didn't call on him for a demonstration, he'd be fine. Does Luke get his name called?
112131121121121121112221212211112.title: What a day!

1121311211211211211122212122111121.content:
Luke sits quietly, hoping he doesn't get called on. Miss Susanne points directly at the Riolu.

"Luke, please come up here for a demonstration." she smiles.

Luke groaned. It seemed that whenever he doesn't want something, he is forced to deal with it. He stands up and walks to the front of the classroom. The Gardevoir points to an Arcanine who happened to sit directly in the front.

"Katie, please come to the front with Luke." Miss Susanne sings excitedly.

Luke shuddered. The Arcanine was staring right at him as she wagged her tail in a seductive manner. Bending down, she showed Luke her derriere. And she lowered her body.

"This is the way most canine Pokémon tease their potential mates." the Gardevoir smirks.

Luke blushed. Was he supposed to mount her? Was he supposed to just watch? What is he supposed to do? Standing there, the Riolu looked completely lost.

"Go ahead, Luke! Mount her!" Miss Susanne urged with a smile.

Luke turned red. Was he really supposed to have intercourse right in the middle of class? The Riolu smiled sheepishly as he proceeded to mount her. The class started to loose giggles, snickers, and chuckles. He could see Karen biting her tongue. Was she really laughing at him?

"Miss Susanne, is this necessary? Can we do this next class? This is only seduction, remember?" Luke blushed harder.

The Gardevoir laughed and replied:

"You're right! I'm getting too far ahead of myself. Tomorrow's class is the breeding process! Sorry!" she giggled and sent them both to their seats.

Luke breathed a sigh of relief and slumped down in his seat. If only he wasn't picked for class, he thought. Seviper nodded. Luke took notes on today's class before the bell rang.
1121311211211211211122212122111121.title: "Do I EVER get a break?!?!"

1121311211211211211122212122111122.content:
Luke silently sat in his seat as Miss Susanne called on a Kirlia and a Hitmontop.

"Phew... Lucky me." Luke breathed a sigh of relief. He turns to look at Karen, who remained focused on him. Karen's eyes narrowed.

Miss Susanne began the class with a clap. Luke jumped in a startled manner. The class stared at him for a minute. The Riolu slumped in his seat, blushing, as he smiled sheepishly. The Gardevoir continued her lesson after that silent minute.

"As I was saying... Amy, you can start!" Miss Susanne instructed as she pointed at the Kirlia. Luke looked at the clock. It was only 3 minutes into the class and it felt like an hour.

Luke looked down at his desk and started to doodle in his notebook. His mind started to wander as he imagined adventuring and exploring vast dungeons. He pictured dueling with bandits and thieves over a pit of lava. As Luke's mind wandered, he drew pictures. His first page was of him fighting a giant monster with steel claws and five gaping mouths. Arbok peeks at his drawing.

"What'cha doing? Drawing a picture? I like the armor your guy has." She whispered.

Luke blushed.

"Thanks. Nobody really compliments my stuff often." The Riolu replies with a shrug.

Arbok watched Luke draw dragons and feral beasts into his next picture. She watched as Luke added himself into the picture again. Arbok giggled.

"Can you draw me with a sword? If you don't want that, can you make me a damsel in the picture?" Arbok smiles as Luke continued to sketch.

The Riolu was quiet. He then drew Seviper as a fire-breathing, serpentine witch. Seviper looked at Luke's drawing and smirked. The sight of the drawing was so distubingly intruiging, that Seviper let out a snicker.

"That's pretty good, kid. You're a natural artist. I like how you added the venom dripping from my fangs like that. Do some more." Seviper commented.

Luke nodded and continued to draw. Suddenly the bell rang. What now?
1121311211211211211122212122111122.title: Just look down and draw cartoons!

11213112112112112111222121221111222.content:
Luke quickly jumped out of his desk and went scurrying out the door. The very movement startled a Bidoof, who happened to be sitting close to the door. Looking back, he saw Karen, who smiled at him, then scowling at the Riolu's new serpentine friends.

"Why does she not trust us? Did I do something wrong?" Arbok asked. Luke shook his head.

To be honest, not even Luke knew why Karen has such a distrust toward Arbok and Seviper. He started imagining different scenarios, one after another. The thought was so vivid, he could almost see it happening. The Riolu pictured Karen glaring at him.

(Karen: It's either those slithering jerks, or me!

Luke: B-B-But you're my friends! Don't make me choose between you!

Arbok: Why are you being so mean to Luke? Why not try to be nice?

Karen: Well, he can forget it! You guys can keep him! )

Luke shuddered. He ran to class, praying that would never happen. He knew that he'd be emotionally crushed if he lost any of his friends. As he sat down, the teacher, who was a Ninetales, started class.

"Hello, class. If anyone has changed their schedule this morning, my name is Miss Scarlett." The Ninetales said as she addressed the class.

Luke heard a few male students in the class mutter to each other.

"You hear that? She's single."
"Hehe... Dude, she's like, 20."

Luke kept hearing comments, and he shook his head. He felt that he was the only guy in there who wasn't a pig powered by lust. Miss Scarlett rolled her eyes as she muttered to herself. Reading her lips to the best of his abilities, Luke assumed Miss Scarlett wasn't pleased with the male students' actions. Turning, Luke saw Karen, who was sitting next to him. She passed the Riolu a note.
11213112112112112111222121221111222.title: Special abilities class?

choices: I'll ask Miss Scarlett for advice about making Karen happy tonight first.
112131121121121121112221212211112221.content:
Luke stared at the note. What it said made the Riolu glare at the note. It read:

"What do you see in those snakes? Do you have a fetish or something?"

The Riolu rips a piece of paper out of his notebook and begins to write an argument to Karen.

"Why can't you just accept the fact that I have other friends? I'm not your pet, so stop treating me like one."

Luke sat in his seat and grinned smugly and waited for a response. He peeked over at Karen, who had a sharp focus on him. Glaring angrily, she was piercing the Riolu's very soul. Luke stopped looking at Karen and turned around, only to see the Ninetales staring at him. Miss Scarlett was noticing the Riolu's actions amongst the other males in the class.

"Is there a problem, Luke?" She asked.

"No, Ma'am. I was... Passing notes. Settling an argument, if I might add." Luke replies with his head lowered.

"You're... Different. You're not drooling over me like the other males. I like you already. You might be my favorite male student. Anyway... If you have an argument, it's usually a lack of communication. Karen, would you kindly come up here to sit by Luke?" Miss Scarlett asks.

The Lucario stood up and reluctantly walks over to Luke's seat. She pulls her lips back in a snarl as she sits down. Her large canine teeth began to frighten Luke again. The Riolu could have sworn that he heard Karen's stomach growl, but he assumed it was his mind trying to scare him. Just then, almost as if reading Luke's mind, Karen started rubbing her midsection hungrily.
Luke's mind narrated the situation and began asking questions to itself.

"How? Lunch was just an hour ago! Didn't she eat?!?" Luke thought.

Just then, it dawned on him. "Karen DIDN'T eat! She spent all of the lunch period looking for ME! She must've been lonely..."

Luke stood up and hugged Karen. The Lucario gasped momentarily, but then sighed with content. Miss Scarlett looked around, then commented:

"well, I guess words aren't needed to solve EVERY argument. Stop snickering, everyone. I like a class with no ill will towards each other. Anyone else need to make amends?" Miss Scarlett piped up.

Luke didn't want to let go of Karen. He wanted this hug to last forever. He felt a small tear roll down his cheek. It was so subtle, that nobody except Karen could notice.

"I'm sorry, Karen. I hope you can forgive me for leaving you. I'll make it up to you. I know you didn't eat lunch, so tonight, I'll make you dinner. Don't be mad at Arbok and Seviper. It was my fault." Luke whispered.

Karen smiled softly and replied quietly:

"I forgive you. I'd like that meal, too."

Luke kisses Karen on the paw and sits back in his seat. He was Karen's pet again, but he liked seeing her happy. Class continues until the bell rings.
112131121121121121112221212211112221.title: Argument of notes?
